com.epam.aircompany.logic

Class EmployeeLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.aircompany.logic.BaseLogic
      • com.epam.aircompany.logic.EmployeeLogic

  • public class EmployeeLogic
extends BaseLogic
    The Class EmployeeLogic contains various methods that use DAO layer to retrieve information about the Employee(s) from a database.
    Author:
    Dzmitry Hrushetski
